translate.name: cart
translate.err_no_prod: The product you have attempted to add to the cart is not available at this time.
translate.err_assoc_login: The product requires associated product(s) in order to be purchased. If you have already purchased the associated products, please login so the required products can be verified against your account.
translate.err_assoc_req: The selected product requires other associated product(s) in order to be purchased.
translate.assoc_one:
You must add one of the following items to your cart in order to purchase the item you selected:
%%items%%
translate.assoc_all:
You must add all of the following items to your cart in order to purchase the item you selected:
%%items%%
translate.err_prod_already: The product you have attempted to add to the cart cannot be added, as it is already in the cart.
translate.host_type_ip: This is an IP based hosting plan, IP address to be assigned.
translate.payment_option: Please Select Your Preferred Payment Option
translate.empty: Your cart is empty, please select one or more products to continue...
translate.remove_items: To edit or remove items, click here.
translate.view_items: Click here for an itemized list of items in this purchase.
translate.hide_items: Click here to hide itemized list.
translate.no_checkout_options: Sorry, no online payment option has been defined for this order type. Please contact customer service for ordering details.
translate.ad_hoc_err: The SKU, Item Name, and Item Price must all be entered, please go back and correct.
